weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens under a mostly sunny sky, the air crisp with a gentle north-northwest breeze that carries the faint scent of salt from the bay. The temperature hovers near a cool, invigorating 54 degrees, gradually dipping to a mild 52 as midday approaches. While the morning may feel bright and cheerful, there lingers a sense of tranquility that suggests the day may not reach its full, vibrant potential. Colorful rooftops contrast with the slate hues of the horizon, but clarity is occasionally wavered by patches of fog that cling to the edges, hinting at the impending marine layer typical of this time of year.

As the sun sets tonight, expect the clouds to gather ever so slightly, ushering in a partly cloudy evening with temperatures sinking to around 47. This will create an ideal backdrop for a cozy gathering; consider wrapping up in layers to ward off the evening chill while enjoying a simple meal at a nearby café or taking a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, where the views of the twinkling cityscape can offer a serene close to the year. It’s the perfect time to savor the quaint pleasures of winter in the city, as the promise of a new beginning dances on the horizon.
